full_description:
Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair

The Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair is a versatile and ergonomic seating option designed for gamers who value comfort and functionality. Its 100mm gas system enables simple height adjustment, accommodating personal preferences during intense gaming sessions. The Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair has a robust 350mm nylon base with arms for stability and support. The chair, made of high-quality materials such as PU and PVC, is built to last and has a fake leather finish for a sleek appearance. The "Butterfly" adjustment mechanism allows users to fine-tune their seating position, while the 360° rotation and 180° tilt options provide further flexibility. The PVC armrests enhance overall comfort, and the chair includes a detachable head support and a lower spine pillow for enhanced support during longer use. The smart design, combined with the synthetic leather finish, makes the Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair a fashionable and functional option for gamers wishing to improve their gaming experience.

Buy Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair From Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Xtrike Me Gaming Chair to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair comes with no warranty.

full_description:
Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair Green

The Xtrike Me GC-905 Gaming Chair in Green is a high-end, adjustable chair intended to fulfill the demands of avid gamers. With its ergonomic design, this chair provides optimal comfort and support throughout lengthy gaming sessions. It has a 100 mm gas lift system, which allows for smooth and accurate height changes. The chair's total height may be changed between 125 cm and 135 cm, while the seat height extends from 44 cm to 54 cm, allowing for varying desk heights and user preferences. The GC-905 is made of high-quality PU and PVC materials, giving it a luxury feel while being easy to maintain. The chair's strong 350 mm nylon base with arms offers outstanding stability and durability, allowing it to handle heavy gaming sessions. The backrest is 57 cm wide and 85 cm high, offering adequate back support, while the armrests are 15 cm high, reducing shoulder pressure. The seat is 53 cm broad and 50 cm deep, providing a roomy and comfortable sitting area with appropriate thigh support. The brilliant green hue creates a lively and energetic atmosphere in any gaming environment. The GC-905 is made to endure, thanks to its sturdy design and high-quality materials, making it a fantastic investment for gamers wishing to elevate their gaming experience with elegance and comfort.

full_description:
Xtrike Me GC-907 RGB Gaming Chair

The Xtrike Me GC-907 RGB Gaming Chair is a gaming seating solution that is meant to provide both comfort and style. With a strong 100mm gas lift mechanism, customers may easily adjust the seat height between 43 and 53 cm to suit their tastes. The Xtrike Me GC-907 Gaming Chair is made of robust materials such as polyurethane and PVC, ensuring lifespan and ease of maintenance. The incorporation of a 350mm nylon base with arms improves stability and support while gaming. The RGB backlight is aesthetically attractive and provides a dynamic touch to the chair, improving the gaming experience. The 3D armrests allow for personalized comfort, while the generously proportioned backrest (58cm width, 82cm height) and 180° movable backrest help users find their ideal posture. With a large seat (57cm width, 48cm depth) and a maximum load capacity of 150kg, the Xtrike Me GC-907 accommodates a wide range of body types, ensuring a comfortable and immersive gaming experience.
